docs.text: in my opinion , a movie reviewer's most important task is to offer an explanation for his opinion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but with soul survivors , i'm so full of critical rage that this review is liable to turn into a venomous , uncontrollable rant , obligations damned .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , protocol forces me to do otherwise .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: soul survivors tells the story of four college-bound friends : cassandra ( melissa sagemiller ) is sweet and innocent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: party girl annabel ( eliza dushku of bring it on ) is dating world-weary harvard student matt ( wes bentley ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: matt still has feelings for cassie , who is now dating sean ( casey affleck ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: driving back from a creepy , gothic party , the quartet gets into a horrific car crash .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sean dies , leaving cassie crestfallen and guilty , made worse because sean saw matt kiss cassie just minutes after sean revealed his love for her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as cassie mopes through her classes , she sees the ghost of sean all over the place , urging her to follow him .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: along with being plagued by other ghastly visions , cassie is also followed by thugs from that strange party .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: annabel and matt try calming her down , but no one shares cass's visions .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she has to figure out this purgatory all by herself .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: rarely have i seen a director so thoroughly mishandle material .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in his directorial debut , steve carpenter does nothing to provoke the audience into feeling any emotion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when the movie's camerawork isn't pedestrian , it's clich ? d .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: carpenter's need for close-ups , his camera following sagemiller from behind , drain the movie of any anticipation .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we already know what to look for , so why should we be surprised ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and the sense of scary atmosphere , which was recently done so well in the others , is nowhere to be found here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: carpenter's script relies on random twists and turns with a minimum of logic and loads of laziness .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is a movie where the ending features one character providing an explanation about the plot to another character , which is one of the lamest screenwriting devices around .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the second lamest device , of course , is the , " oh , it was all a dream " resolution .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and guess what ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this movie has both !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: not that the main body of the film , which has sagemiller constantly running in fear or having a nervous breakdown , is anything worthwhile .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: since there's no captivating dialogue , no character chemistry exists anywhere .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that's a huge problem , since the four main characters are supposed to be couples .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: carpenter can't even get the smutty scenes right , which are becoming more prevalent in pg-13 movies like bring it on and get over it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: [the film was recently re-cut from an r rating to get more kids in the seats .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: -ed . ]
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when sagemiller and dushku dance together at a club , he rarely shows them in a full shot and he never keeps the camera on them for longer than a second before relating to some michael bay-style quick cuts .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and when sagemiller and dushku take a shower together after getting covered in paint , they're fully clothed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: regardless , any sexiness in that scene is undercut by its stupidity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why wouldn't they wash the clothes in the sink or in the washing machine ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why would they shower in their clothes ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what if they weren't covered in latex paint ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the cast , which will see better material in the future , would be wise to leave this one off their resumes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i felt sorry for affleck , who i've liked in other movies , and bentley , who was great in american beauty .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dushku , who possesses an alluring femme fetale quality , has got to stop taking roles belonging to rose mcgowan .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as for sagemiller ( star of the aforementioned get over it ) , i want to see her in a movie where she plays a person , and not an object for gawking .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and i'm not even getting into luke wilson's role as a priest .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at least he's friends with wes anderson .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bottom line : soul survivors is so awful i feel compelled to knock on doors and warn people about it .
docs.label: negative
